text: was a Japanese freestyle swimmer. She was born in Hashimoto, Wakayama. She competed in the women's 400 metre freestyle and 4 Ã— 100 metre freestyle relay events at the 1932 and 1936 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==Other websites== *Hatsuko Morioka at the International Olympic Committee Category:1915 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Competitors at the 1936 Summer Olympics Category:Japanese swimmers Category:People from Wakayama Prefecture
